channel.title: [help]Making a New Server[help]
channel.description: Hey I am new with making servers and clients, and I was wondering if someone could help me on making one. I please beg of you hands over knees kissing your shoes if some one any one would be generous enough to help me out on making my server. Yes I have went through the tutorials and I am only asking through your generous offers if someone would help me out, or possible if I could simple watch them, or learn off of them when they make their server. Please respond to my email/msn. extremepeace@hotmail.com THANK YOU VERY MUCH.

item.title: [help]Making a New Server[help]

@gobabygo6 wrote:

umm. actually ill download the messanger right now. tons of people have asked me to get it so what the hell. and yes.

a 508 client?

Read full topic

item.description:
@guardiansg9 wrote:

Hey thanks for responding, you got any ideas on some good clients we can start off with? And btw do you have any type of messenger?

Read full topic

item.title: [help]Making a New Server[help]
item.dc:creator: @gobabygo6 gobabygo6
item.description:
@gobabygo6 wrote:

hey. im a newbie but my friend made a super great graphic server a few years back. i could text him and we could make one

just download and install a 508 server/client/cache

else we can make a 503 or a 317, just send me a copy of the server/client/scource you have and ill check it out. i dont think ill be able to email you tho. PM me

Read full topic

@guardiansg9 wrote:

Hey I am new with making servers and clients, and I was wondering if someone could help me on making one. I please beg of you hands over knees kissing your shoes if some one any one would be generous enough to help me out on making my server. Yes I have went through the tutorials and I am only asking through your generous offers if someone would help me out, or possible if I could simple watch them, or learn off of them when they make their server. Please respond to my email/msn.

THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
